tool_description:
The Open Movie Database

The MoviesDB API is a RESTful web service to obtain movie information, all content and images on the site are contributed and maintained by our users.
name: MoviesDB
title: MoviesDB

api_list.name: Search by movie Title
api_list.description: Search any movie/tv series by a valid Title

api_list.name: Search Movies/TV Series by keyword
api_list.description: Search all movie/tv series by keyword/keywords

api_list.name: Search by movie ID
api_list.description: Search any movie/tv series by a valid ID

required_parameters.name: i
required_parameters.description: A valid Movies/TV Series ID (e.g. tt1285016)
